data.what_is: 48hourslogo is a crowdsourced logo contest website. It allows small business owners and entrepreneurs to create custom logos by launching a design contest receive design options from freelance designers around the world.
data.product_description: 48hourslogo is a crowdsourced logo contest website. It allows small business owners and entrepreneurs to create custom logos by launching a design contest receive design options from freelance designers around the world.

initial_reviews.review_title: A very professional tool for logos.
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task 48hourslogo helped with:
This service was used for the creation of a logo for the company, has quality designs that adapt to what you need, really with the use of this tool was achieved professional results and unique designs, the projects was a success thanks to this tool.

What do you like best about 48hourslogo?
In general the tool I like, allows you to create logos quickly and the quality of them are very professional, its cost is not high and offers a really fast service, the delivery time is excellent so it is a positive point, this tool is fast, useful and creates logos really customized to what you are looking for.

What do you dislike about 48hourslogo?
The fact of not being able to see the advances that are made in the logo can be a little annoying, but usually the results are better than expected.

Recommendations to others considering 48hourslogo:
I recommend it to any company that wants a quick and quality logo.

What problems is 48hourslogo solving and how is that benefiting you?
The use of this tool allowed to create a quick and professional logo, without having to be a professional in design, was not a high cost and did not have to go through any long process, only had to provide information about the company and this is responsible for entering the product for a price that really is not so high for the quality of what it offers.

Describe the project or task 48hourslogo helped with:
Great service within a reasonable time frame. Listens to what you want in your custom logo and lets you make your logo perfect for what you want in a logo. Reasonable priced as well they do not over charge you and gives the best final product that best suits the vision and look of the business you want.

What do you like best about 48hourslogo?
The way that the people of the service treat you and can deliver such a great product in such a short time frame. They really listen to your needs and try their best to meet your needs for the logo you want. In the end a great logo is a great design and would definitely use them again in the future.  Used for personal use to test them out but they can definitely provide bigger company's with the needed logo as well even if they do not already have a marketing or design team putting the extra budget to the design budget is worth it.

What do you dislike about 48hourslogo?
Not knowing how your logo will turn out can be bad at times but when the final product is produced you can not worry anymore and use the logo to promote your business with the new logo that you have provided details to help create.

Recommendations to others considering 48hourslogo:
Go for it, they are worth it.

Describe the project or task 48hourslogo helped with:
They helped create a graphic for my business and logo

What do you like best about 48hourslogo?
Their graphics along with their speed and customizable logos

What do you dislike about 48hourslogo?
Nothing that I can really thing of at the moment
